description:
From the first run to the last, these snow pants will help your little one forget about the weather. Waterproof face fabric with sealed seams keeps legs dry, and synthetic insulation adds warmth on long descents and windy chairlift rides. Extendable cuffs and adjustable elastic suspenders mean these pants will last through a growth spurt or two. Ankle gaiters snug over boot-tops to keep powder on the outside where it belongs.

  • Waterproof breathable DryVent™ 2-layer shell, fully seam sealed for ultimate weather protection
  • Bib lined with recycled polyester fleece for warmth
  • Legs lined with smooth recycled polyester for easy layering
  • Heatseeker™ Eco synthetic insulation uses 70% post-consumer recycled material
  • Split kangaroo bib pockets keeps electronics warm and necessities close
  • Front-zip entry makes getting into and out of easy, and speeds up bathroom breaks
  • Adjustable elastic suspenders fit kids of all sizes
  • Cuffs extend by 2in. to accommodate growth
  • Cuffs are reinforced at hem, with abrasion-resistant kick patches on inner legs
  • Ankle gaiters with grippy elastic cuffs keep snow out
name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Bib Pants - Children
